description: This file defines the MockLegacyKeypadCluster Java class which simulates a keypad device cluster, including handling LED states and keypad button presses for testing purposes.

classes.name: MockLegacyKeypadCluster
classes.description: A mock class to simulate a legacy keypad device cluster, including LED control and keypad input simulation.

classes.name: ServerMfgCommand
classes.description: Class defining server manufacturing command constants for the keypad.

classes.name: ClientMfgCommand
classes.description: Class defining client manufacturing command constants for the keypad.

classes.name: KeypadButton
classes.description: Enumeration of keypad buttons that can be pressed.

classes.name: LEDMode
classes.description: Enumeration of LED modes such as OFF, SOLID, BLINK, etc.

methods.name: requestPanelStateChange
methods.description: Simulates a keypad button press to request a change in the panel's state.

methods.name: parseSetLEDEvent
methods.description: Parses the payload to set LED mode, color, and duration, logging appropriate warnings or info.

methods.name: handleMfgCommand
methods.description: Handles manufacturing commands; specifically processes SET_LED commands.
